name: X-Force Under Attack
description:
X-Force Under Attack brings back all the charm of shmup games from the 80's/90's. It's a frenetic and chaotic space shooter with insane battles against extremely difficult bosses. Embark on epic battles and stop enemies from establishing a military base orbiting the planet Genesis

Bullet Hell


Defeat several enemies and hundreds of projectiles, coming from all sides at the same time.

Ships


Select the ship that best suits you. Each ship has unique attributes that make it best for a specific player type and stage, so choose wisely.

Bosses


Fight gigantic, intimidating bosses, each one more difficult than the last, and defeat them to end an era of tyranny.



  • Adventure through 10 beautiful and unique levels.
  • Defeat the gigantic bosses spread throughout space.
  • Make upgrades to your ship to be able to fight and defeat enemies.
  • Use Power-ups to annihilate various shots and enemies on the screen.
  • Dodge comets lost in space
  • And much more.
